title: Apple releases security updates for macOS Big Sur and Catalina following macOS 12.2.1
content:
Apple has issued new updates for users still running Big Sur or Catalina on their Macs. macOS 11.6.4 and a Catalina security fix follow the release of the Monterey 12.2.1 security and Bluetooth battery drain bug fix release last week.

more…

The post Apple releases security updates for macOS Big Sur and Catalina following macOS 12.2.1 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has issued new updates for users still running Big Sur or Catalina on their Macs. macOS 11.6.4 and a Catalina security fix follow the release of the Monterey 12.2.1 security and Bluetooth battery drain bug fix release last week. macOS 11.6.4 and the Catalina 2022-002 security update are starting to roll out now via [â€¦]
